main event: A civilian pilot observed a circular object flying NE to SW near Goodland, Kansas, believed to be a falling meteorite.
interesting points: The object was described as circular and observed from an aircraft at 8,500 feet., The sighting lasted four seconds., The pilot reported the object was going very fast, faster than a jet., The sighting was conducted in darkness, limiting visibility., The conclusion by investigators was that it was likely a meteor or meteorite.
sighted object: one circular object in the sky
